item.title: Offshore containers
item.description: We produce special containers and equipment intended for petroleum industry. The containers are of the offshore type which means they are certified according to respective standards for reloading on an open sea.

item.title: Welding
item.description: We are dedicated to delivering welding and inspection processes that adhere to the stringent standards of ISO 3834-2. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our use of advanced techniques, including MIG (131), MAG (135), and TIG (141). From concept to creation, our metal fabrication services cover a wide spectrum, including structural steel, aluminium, and stainless steel fabrication. We understand that each project is unique. That’s why International Welding Engineer (IWE) is an integral part of our team.

item.title: Cargo chasis trailers
item.description: Our additional long-standing expertise lies in the production of cargo trailers. Here, we excel in collaboration with our customers by processing our own technical documentation. Typically, in this sector, we deal with small-batch production. We are capable of working with high-strength and wear-resistant quenched steels, such as S600 MC, Weldox 900, and others. Subsequently, in this field, we have implemented our own automated process for welding long seams. We manufacture trailers of various lengths, ranging from 6 m to 12 m.

item.title: Welding automation
item.description: CTP 1350 We developed device for welding long welds. The device is mainly designed for welding long welds of fillet welds and butt welds by methods MIG or MAG. Advantages of this device is simultaneous welding from two sides. Its main components consist of a support frame with a longitudinal positioning table for workpieces and a horizontal linear track with a traversing carriage. This track includes a carriage drive, wire feeders, welding torches, technological torches with vertical and horizontal correction supports, welding torch holders, and a control unit.

item.title: Laser cutting
item.description: Laser Genius+ 2040 6kW, PRIMA POWER, (Fiber technology) Laser Genius+ is combined with the new fiber laser head, new electronics and innovative mounting for the optics and centering system, guarantee a maximum level of precision and cutting quality. Parameters Value Axis strokes: X: 4 320 mm, Y: 2 200 mm, Z: 150 mm Laser power: 6 000 W (max. thickness of standard steel, stainless steel and aluminium is 25 mm) Maximum piece weight: 2000kg Positioning accuracy and repeatability: X, Y: 0,03 mm Speed: 130/min (trajectory 180m/min) Acceleration: 2,8 g

item.title: Stainless steel products
item.description: One of the three pillars of our production is focused on welding stainless steel. Our dedicated workshop enables us to weld smaller, lighter weldments compared to the production of containers or trailers. Here, we have experience in manufacturing food industry structures, pipes, tanks, and various other welded components. In this field, we have also encountered heat-resistant stainless steels.

item.title: Press brake and roll bending
item.description: Safan E-Brake B 100-3100 The E-Brake incorporates all the benefits of the proven servo-electric drive concept. The transfer of pressing force relies on a mechanism with flat belts and a set of rotating wheels on roller bearings. Thanks to incomparably higher acceleration and deceleration of the ram, it achieves greater productivity compared to hydraulic presses. Parameters Value Bending force: MAX. 1 000 kN Working length: MAX. 3 100 mm BENDMAK | CY SERIES 3-ROLL Intial pinch plate rolls The Bendmak CY Series 3 Roll Initial Pinch style of plate rolls are the most popular style for thinner material requirements.

item.title: Machining
item.description: In the context of our manufacturing operations a milling machine and a lathe offer support. These tools empower us to adapt flexibly to the requirements of our primary welding production. Milling machine Microcut VMCA 1000 CNC Parameters Value Traverses: X: 1 000 mm, Y: 500 mm, Z: 500 mm Table: 1520 x 520 mm Spindle speed: 10 000 rpm Turning machine SA 48/1000 CNC Parameters Value Max. swing diameter, without bed bridge: 710 mm Swing diameter over bed: 475 mm Max.

item.title: Other products
item.description: Explore the gallery of our other products. In the gallery, you will find countless products, using individual technologies and their combinations. We offer single sheet metal parts, bent sheet metal parts, weldments, machined parts, assembled units. We also are capable to weld aluminium parts.

item.title: Assemblies and products testing
item.description: We offer product testing services to our clients. One of the most crucial tests we conduct is on offshore welding structures, where we have our own testing equipment. This includes a testing tower with a hydraulic cylinder capable of exerting a force of up to 100 tons. We perform two types of tests: production tests and prototype tests. Additionally, we provide pressure tests and leak tests for welded structures such as tanks, containers, pipes, and more.

item.title: Engineering
item.description: The company is capable of processing the necessary technical documentation, such as reading and understanding manufacturing drawings. It can also handle 3D models, utilizing Solid Edge 2019 software for this purpose. The team consists of skilled individuals who are not afraid to take on projects. They can work even with less than perfect technical documentation. If needed, they can redraw manufacturing drawings for their production needs and choose the simplest and most cost-effective manufacturing technology.

item.title: Blasting
item.description: We have a spray booth where we perform surface treatment by blasting with fine glass beads. We blast stainless steel or aluminium parts. Through this process, the material’s surface acquires a uniform velvet appearance. Parameters Value Width: MAX. 2 000 mm Height: MAX. 2 500 mm Length: MAX. 5 500 mm
